sense.def:
Foil
je kovina v obliki tankega lista.

seg.quote: ...the foil wrapper of a bar of chocolate.

sense.def:
To foil someone's plan or attempt at something
pomeni preprečiti, da bi neki načrt ali poskus uspel.

Kadar je nekaj
a good foil for something
, je z nečim v nasprotju in so zato njegove dobre lastnosti še opaznejše.

seg.quote: She had bronzed skin, for which her yellow swimsuit was a perfect foil.
